name: Argus (2014)
description:
The religious war that began with the "AXA Massacre" became more intense day by day, and finally led to the fall of Bahia Freh, the royal capital of the Kingdom of Frenia.

It is the knight Chiara of the Kingdom of Frenia, the Paladin Aldin of the Melia religion, and you who control the "eyes" to them.

Can you overcome the many demon beasts and the trials that attack each other's camps and see the end of the dark ages dominated by God and teachings?

A medieval dark fantasy epic drawn with unique characters and magnificent music. We will deliver it to those who love RPGs with a bold world view.
